memberdef.argsstring: (const char *portName, const char *commandPortName, int dataPortNumber, int statusPortnumber, int maxDataPortBuffers, int maxSizeX, int maxSizeY, int maxBuffers, size_t maxMemory, int priority, int stackSize)
memberdef.name: pixirad

briefdescription.para: Constructor for Pixirad driver; most parameters are simply passed to ADDriver::ADDriver.

detaileddescription.para:
After calling the base class constructor this method creates a thread to collect the detector data, and sets reasonable default values for the parameters defined in this class, asynNDArrayDriver, and ADDriver.
portName
The name of the asyn port driver to be created.
commandPortName
The name of the asyn port previously created with drvAsynIPPortConfigure to communicate with the PiXirad server on port 2222.
dataPortNumber
The IP number of the port on which the detector broadcasts data packets. Currently must be 2223.
statusPortNumber
The IP number of the port on which the detector broadcasts status packets. Currently must be 2224.
maxDataPortBuffers
The size of the epicsMessageQueue for passing UDP buffers. This limits the maximum number of buffers that will be allocated.
maxSizeX
The size of the Pixirad detector in the X direction.
maxSizeY
The size of the Pixirad detector in the Y direction.
maxBuffers
The maximum number of NDArray buffers that the NDArrayPool for this driver is allowed to allocate. Set this to -1 to allow an unlimited number of buffers.
maxMemory
The maximum amount of memory that the NDArrayPool for this driver is allowed to allocate. Set this to -1 to allow an unlimited amount of memory.
priority
The thread priority for the asyn port driver thread if ASYN_CANBLOCK is set in asynFlags.
stackSize
The stack size for the asyn port driver thread if ASYN_CANBLOCK is set in asynFlags.

briefdescription.para: Called when asyn clients call pasynInt32->write().

detaileddescription.para:
This function performs actions for some parameters, including ADAcquire, ADTriggerMode, etc. For all parameters it sets the value in the parameter library and calls any registered callbacks..
pasynUser
pasynUser structure that encodes the reason and address.
value
Value to write.

briefdescription.para: Called when asyn clients call pasynFloat64->write().

detaileddescription.para:
This function performs actions for some parameters, including ADAcquireTime, ADGain, etc. For all parameters it sets the value in the parameter library and calls any registered callbacks..
pasynUser
pasynUser structure that encodes the reason and address.
value
Value to write.

Prints details about the driver if details>0. It then calls the ADDriver::report() method.
fp
File pointed passed by caller where the output is written to.
details
If >0 then driver details are printed.

briefdescription.para: This function reads the environmental parameters (temperature, humidity, etc.) which are periodically UDP broadcast by the Pixirad box on port 2224.

memberdef.argsstring: (int ofs0, int fs0, int ofs2, int fs1, int fs2, int ibias, int vbgMcalDAC)
memberdef.name: setAutoCalParams

briefdescription.para: Driver for PiXirad pixel array detectors using their server server over TCP/IP socket.
